guideline.name: FDA PGx Association [Pharmacogenetic Associations for which the Data Support Therapeutic Management Recommendations]: Tramadol - CYP2D6

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily D member 6

text.html: "Results in higher systemic and breast milk active metabolite concentrations, which may result in respiratory depression and death. Contraindicated in children under 12 and in adolescents following tonsillectomy/adenoidectomy. Breastfeeding is not recommended during treatment."
